articles.title: India's economy was starting to recover. Then a second Covid wave hit - CNN
articles.description: India's economy was turning a corner earlier this year as the country started to accelerate out of the recession it suffered in 2020. But a disastrous surge in Covid-19 cases threatens that progress.
